persona.description:
Persona: Dr. Elizabeth "Liz" Anders

Dr. Liz Anders is a leading AI researcher with a PhD in Computer Science from Stanford University, specializing in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing. Currently, she serves as the Chief AI Officer at an innovative tech startup in Silicon California, where she spearheads the development and integration of AI technologies into various products and services. With over 15 years of experience in AI research, she is passionate about leveraging AI to solve real-world problems and enhance human potential.

Persona: David Sanders

David Sanders is a software engineer with over 10 years of experience specifically in web development and data management. While he understands AI concepts and has incorporated machine learning algorithms into a few of his past projects, he is currently in the process of building proficiency in this domain as a software architect at a leading software development company.

Name: Lucy Thompson

Background: Lucy Thompson is a single mother working two jobs in a small Mid-western town. One job is as a retail cashier downtown, and the other is as a part-time janitor at the local high school. Despite being hardworking and adept at what she does, she hasn't had much exposure to advanced technology, thus her understanding and knowledge of AI and similar technologies is rather limited.
